content: Generative AI, like GitHub Copilot, is being used for code completion. It suggests entire lines or blocks of code to developers as they type, speeding up the development process significantly.

Another key application of generative AI in software development is automated test generation. Models can analyze code to create relevant unit tests and integration tests, improving code coverage and quality.

AI is also being used to automate documentation writing. Generative models can parse codebases and generate clear, human-readable documentation for functions, classes, and APIs, keeping docs in sync with the code.
